data.title: US: Headline and Core Inflation Rise 3% Annualized in September
data.description: The Consumer Price Index (CPI) rose 0.3% month-on-month (m/m) in September, a tick below the consensus forecast in Bloomberg. On a twelve-month basis, CPI rose to 3.0% (from 2.9% the month prior).
